attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When Slough Council refuse planning for big Developments.The Government Inspectors overule the Council.Slough has no Green fields left for Development.Why don,t they build on brown field sites.
The Developers have plans to build 300 homes on or near Upton court Park.Also 300 homes on Eton playing fields.Slough town Football Club has to play in Windsor because of no site in Slough.
Where are the children going to play if their is no Parkland left in Slough.
